text: I m   and dealing with an STDI waited until I was married to have sex  I was   Even though we were both virgins  I always used condoms because she didn t like the side effects of birth control After two years or so  she decided she was  bored  and left me in a sexless marriage for years  Then I got divorced At age   I finally found someone willing to have sex with me again  She claimed she didn t have any STDs  For some reason  I believed her Six months later  I notice the tip of my penis looks blue  A mole I ve had since birth turned into a wart  There are black dots near my urethra I get an STD test  It s negative  A doctor examines my penis and doesn t identify any STD Still  I m worried it s something  I do more research and realize it s probably HPV I get the mole turned wart surgically removed  However  the tip still looks bluish and those black dots are still there  I hear HPV can go away after two years I turn   If anything  it looks worse I went to a different clinic this time  They actually identified new almost undetectable warts and give me imiquimod cream for those I ve been doing that for a month  No effect except for a red rash  a side effect  in the tip of the tip of my penis that doesn t seem to be going away  Now it s blue and gray and bumpy and it s just  a nightmare I ve been involved romantically but not sexually with someone recently  I ve been terrified about revealing this  Sometimes I ll let slip things like  I m a freak  and  subconsciously  I think I pushed her away Now I don t even have that  Crumbs  It was all I had I used to be proud of my member  Now it s just  a horror show  I don t want to live with that for the rest of my life  I can t

text: An introduction to Flawless August Hey Hey  So since its a new month  I want to introduce a new  event  like NoNutNovember and FingerFreeFebruary to you  Flawless August   I know that the name doesn t nearly sound as good as the other two  but I didn t come up with it anyways  The Idea came from a German Streamer YouTuber named Taddl btw will link him at the end of this Post   What is the Idea of Flawless August   It s nothing really ground breaking or revolutionary but I still wanna share it with you  Soooo The Idea is to do or not do things that are good bad for you for an entire month and maybe even longer   You have to pay attention that you do it in the correct off course  I wouldn t recommend that you do things that are bad for you and don t do things that are good for you  The Idea isn t  that you try to do things that you know you won t have the motivation to do it anyways   You know pretty damn well  that you are to lazy to work out consistently  It s easier to not do things than to do things so maybe if you think you drink to much Cola or something consider to don t drink Cola  What you do or not do in the end  do you have to choose for yourself  You can also push yourself to your limits   and beyond  but we could also make a  SuperSaiyajinSeptember for that  Here a little example what I do for Flawles August  Don t watch porn  Don t go on Twitter   Practice French on Duolingo everyday   Write in my diary at least once in the week   Practice playing Piano or guitar at least every two days  If you also decide to participate in Flawless August  I would be happy if you write your list in the comments   Taddls Video   It s in German   https youtu be hPP bxsMObM https youtu be hPP bxsMObM He also makes music https open spotify com artist l dcABCTyZKrkskt Z u si cTE WH Q QMCbQrwbsVw Have a nice day
summary: Flawless August is a new month-long event. The Idea came from a German YouTuber Taddl. The idea is to do or not do things that are bad for you for an entire month and choose for yourself.
